items.sentence: The defense lawyer didn\'t ask the right questions.
There\'s a leak in the roof that needs to be fixed.
There has always been war and there always will be.
Both of Tom\'s parents died when he was very young.
Can you remember your kindergarten teacher\'s name?
This is a good dictionary for high school students.
This might be the last time we ever see each other.
Tom told me that he thought Boston was a safe city.
Tom told us that we could buy a ticket at the door.
Tom tried to cheer Mary up, but she kept on crying.
We wouldn\'t want to disobey the teacher, would we?
I pretended that I didn\'t know what was happening.
There\'s no reason both of us need to go to Boston.
There\'s something else I need to discuss with you.
Maybe you need to be reminded how dangerous Tom is.
Is there any place around here that rents bicycles?
It was believed that the sun went around the earth.
This one\'s crowded, so let\'s take the next train.
Today\'s a bit hotter than usual, don\'t you think?
Would you like to go out to have a drink somewhere?
Would you like to go to Boston with me next summer?
Would you mind giving me a ride to the post office?
Would you mind if I asked you a question about Tom?
I don\'t know how to make Thousand Island dressing.
I don\'t think that Tom knows where I used to live.
I don\'t want to hear about all your ex-boyfriends.
I don\'t want to hear about your personal problems.
Both Tom and John wanted to take Mary to the dance.
Tom thinks it\'s better not to lend Mary any money.
Tom thinks that he\'s the best French teacher here.
Tom thought Mary was lying about where she\'d been.
There are only just a few passengers on that train.
There were lots of happy kids in the swimming pool.
This is where Tom said that he buried the treasure.
I gained back the weight I\'d lost over the summer.
No one is in a better position to do that than Tom.
No one pays attention to anything Tom says anymore.
Nobody told me that it was going to cost this much.
Tom talked Mary into going to the concert with him.
Tom took off his socks and threw them on the floor.
Tom has to stay home and take care of his children.
I think it\'s time for me to get a bit of exercise.
I\'m sure you didn\'t mean to hurt Tom\'s feelings.
Tom has been married to Mary for over thirty years.
Tom has just started serving a three year sentence.
Tom is lucky to have a woman like Mary in his life.
Tom is the person that actually pulled the trigger.
Tom is unable to decide which shirt he should wear.
Tom knew better than to try to kiss Mary in public.
Tom knew immediately that what Mary said was a lie.
